info.title: Redis Data Integration API

Protected route.

post.description:
Tests the connection to the source database.

Args:
    body: The connection details according to the OpenAPI Scheme.

Returns:
    Union[ConnectionStatusSingleConnection, Error]: The connection status.

schema.title: Response Sources Dry Run Api V1 Pipelines Sources Dry Run Post

post.description: Tests connection to the target database(s).
Tests connection by name to the target database.

get.description:
Fetches column metadata for specified tables in a source.

Args:
    source_name (str): Source name.
    schema (Optional[str]): Schema name. Defaults to None.
    tables (str): Table names.

Returns:
    MetadataResponse: Column metadata information for the specified tables.

Fetches available schemas for the specified source.

Args:
    source_name (str): The name of the source.

Returns:
    SchemaResponse: List of available schema names for the source.

Fetches available databases for the specified source.

Args:
    source_name (str): The name of the source.

Returns:
    DatabaseResponse: List of available databases for the source.

Fetches metadata for specified schema from a source.

Args:
    source_name (str): Source name.
    schema (Optional[str]): Schema name. Defaults to None.
    tables (Optional[str]): Comma-separated list of table names to filter by. Defaults to None.

Returns:
    MetadataResponse: Detailed metadata information for the specified schema and tables, or all schemas/tables if none specified.

parameters.name: tables

schema.description: Comma-separated list of table names to filter by
schema.title: Tables

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of table names to filter by

get.description:
Fetches available tables for the specified schema in a source.

Args:
    source_name (str): The name of the source.
    schema (str): The schema to fetch tables from.

Raises:
    HTTPException: Raised when no sources are provided in the connection details.

Returns:
    TableResponse: List of tables available in the specified schema.

schema.title: Response Retrieve Pipelines Api V1 Pipelines Get

post.description:
Deploys a pipeline.

Args:
    body: Pipeline configuration
    dry_run: If True, only validates the pipeline without deploying it.

patch.description: This endpoint allows for partial updates to the pipeline configuration. It expects a JSON Object containing pipeline configuration keys to be updated. JSON Merge Patch is used to update the configuration, see RFC 7396. Arrays are replaced, not merged.

schema.title: Response Undeploy Pipelines Api V1 Pipelines Undeploy Post

get.description: Retrieves a list of all supported JMESPath functions (builtin and custom) that can be used in JMESPath.
Returns the YAML template describing the config for the specified db type.

schema.title: Response Pipelines Config Templates Api V1 Pipelines Config Templates Ingest  Db Type  Get

get.description: Returns the YAML templates describing how to create a job

schema.title: Response Pipelines Jobs Templates Api V1 Pipelines Jobs Templates Ingest Get

post.description: Executes a job using input data in a dry-run mode.

schema.title: Response Job Dry Run Api V1 Pipelines Jobs Dry Run Post
Response Pipelines Config Schemas Api V1 Pipelines Config Schemas Get
Response Pipelines Jobs Schemas Api V1 Pipelines Jobs Schemas Get

put.description:
Updates multiple processor properties in RDI settings.
The request body should be a dictionary with property names as keys and new values as values.

multi_update.description: Example of updating read_batch_size, write_batch_size, and target_data_type.

schema.title: Response Update Processors Api V1 Pipelines Processors Put

put.description:
Upserts a single processor property by property name.
The request body should contain a single 'value' field with the new value for the property.
The property name is specified in the URL path.

read_batch_size.description: Example of updating the read_batch_size property.

target_data_type.description: Example of updating the target_data_type property.

write_batch_size.description: Example of updating the write_batch_size property.

schema.title: Response Upsert Processors Property Api V1 Pipelines Processors  Prop  Put

put.description:
Stores multiple key-value pairs under a single secret name in the key store.
NOTE: {secret_name} is legacy and is not used - calculated automatically

Args:
    secret_keys (SecretKeyModel): The secret key/value pairs to set.

Returns:
    OperationResponse: The operation response.

Sets multiple secret values in the key store for multiple secret names.

Args:
    secrets (SecretsModel): Collection of secrets to store.

Returns:
    OperationResponse: The operation response.

post.description: Starts a trace session for troubleshooting data transformation.

job.title: Job settings to dry run with.

rejected_only.title: Indicating whether to trace only rejected change records.

timeout.title: The maximum duration of the trace in seconds.
